data.title: Villa Rica, Georgia Population 2024
data.text:
Poverty in Villa Rica

The race most likely to be in poverty in Villa Rica is Hispanic , with 19.93% below the poverty level.

The race least likely to be in poverty in Villa Rica is White , with 3.55% below the poverty level.

The poverty rate among those that worked full-time for the past 12 months was 1.34% . Among those working part-time, it was 10.94% , and for those that did not work, the poverty rate was 15.75% .
